text: @realDonaldTrump You had the opportunity to make it great but you hid in a bunker. You could have shined in this moment of #COVID19 & found solutions & compassion. You could have marched with the protestors against injustice.  Instead, you just made shit worse.  Get out of our house!

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
